info.description:
Domainrobot JSON API for managing: Domains, SSL
											Certificates, DNS and
											much more.
info.title: Domainrobot JSON API

post.description: Order a new certificate. The operation is asynchronous and creates a job.
Inquire a list of certificates with certain details. The data to be displayed can be extended per url paremeter.
Prepare a certificate order. This call checks the csr and generates authentication data required for further calls like order, renew, reissue, revoke, delete.

get.description: Inquire the data for the specified certificate.

put.description: Reissue an existing certificate. The operation is asynchronous and creates a job.

delete.description: Delete an existing certificate. The operation is asynchronous and creates a job.

put.description: Update a comment for an existing certificate.
Renew an existing certificate. The operation is asynchronous and creates a job.

delete.description: Revoke an existing certificate. The operation is asynchronous and creates a job.

post.description: Create a new domain contact.
Inquire a list of contacts with certain details. The data to be displayed can be extended per url paremeter.

get.description: Inquire the data for the specified domain contact.
Fetch the document for the given alias. The alias can be an ID, UUID or a script name like pricelist.xml.

post.description: Order a new domain. The operation is asynchronous and creates a job.
Inquire a list of domains with certain details. The data to be displayed can be extended per url paremeter.

post.summary: Buy a domain from the premium market
post.description: Buy a domain from the premium market. The operation is asynchronous and creates a job.
Inquire a list of cancelations with certain details. The data to be displayed can be extended per url paremeter.
Inquire a list of restorable domains with certain details. The data to be displayed can be extended per url paremeter.

get.description: Fetch the data for the specified domain.

put.description: Update an existing domain. The operation is asynchronous and creates a job.

post.description: Create an authinfo1 for the specified domain.

delete.description: Delete an existing authinfo1 for the specified domain.

post.description: Create an authinfo2 for the specified domain.

get.description: Fetch the cancelation data for the specified domain.

post.description: Create a cancelation for the specified domain.

put.description: Update an existing cancelation for the specified domain.

delete.description: Delete an existing cancelation for the specified domain.

post.description: Transfer a domain. The operation is asynchronous and creates a job.
Inquire a list of jobs with certain details.
Inquire a list of finished jobs with certain details.

get.description: Inquire the data for the specified finished job.
Inquire the data for the specified job.

post.description: Login and create a new session.

parameters.name: acl
parameters.description: Specifies whether the acls are returned in the response. The possible values are true or false.

parameters.name: profiles
parameters.description: Specifies whether the user profile is returned in the response. The possible values are true or false.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: Specifies whether the customer data is returned in the response. The possible values are true or false.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Defines the timeout of the session in minutes. Default is 10 minutes. The possible values are true or false.

get.description: Logout and delete the current session.

post.description: Create a new redirect.
Inquire a list of redirects with certain details. The data to be displayed can be extended per url paremeter.

get.description: Inquire the data for the specified redirect.

post.description: Create a new sslcontact.
Inquire a list of sslcontacts with certain details. The data to be displayed can be extended per url paremeter.

get.description: Inquire the data for the specified sslcontact.

post.description: Create a zone.
Inquire a list of zones with certain details. The data to be displayed can be extended per url paremeter.

get.description: Fetch the data for the specified zone.
Fetch the axfr data for the specified zone.

post.description: Transfer the specified zone.

updater.description: The updating user of the object.

caType.description: The type of the intermediate certificate.

dns.description: The dns entry for dns based authentication.

fileName.description: The filename for file based authentication.

fileContent.description: The content for file based authentication.

approverEmails.description: The approver addresses for email based authentication.

provisioning.description: Activates automatic provisioning of the zone for dns based authentication.

updater.description: The updating user of the object.

partnerOrderId.description: The order number of the related request

software.description: The webserver software in use, relevant values: 'II5' for Mircosoft, 'APACHE2' for Linux

sha.description: The signature hash algorithm which was used

expire.description: The date on which the certificate expires

histories.description: The history of the certificate (old certificate versions)

password.description: The password that is to be used for the certificate download. Only for S/MIME!

organizationUnitName.description: The organization unit. Only for S/MIME!

certificateTransparency.description: Activates the certificate transparency for a certificate. Default is "True".

certificateTransparencyPrivacy.description: The privacy settings for certificate transparency. Default is "Redacted".

domain.description: The domain, which the redirect belongs.

hasCsr.description: States if a self created CSR is to be used for S/MIME. Default is false. Only for S/MIME!

idn.description: The IDN version of the URL of the target domain.

san.description: The subject alternative names, listed in the csr.

keySize.description: The size of the csr key.

countryCode.description: The country code defined in the csr.

challengePassword.description: The password defined in the csr.

state.description: The state defined in the csr.

city.description: The city defined in the csr.

organization.description: The organization defined in the csr.

organizationUnit.description: The organization unit defined in the csr.

email.description: The email defined in the csr.

idn.description: The idn version of the common name.

revoked.description: The revoked date of the certificate.

updater.description: The updating user of the object.

alias.description: The unique alias of the contact

fname.description: The first name of the contact

lname.description: The last name of the contact

state.description: The local country state of the contact

phone.description: The phone number of the contact

fax.description: The fax number of the contact

nicRef.description: The nic references of the contact

domainsafe.description: The nic references of the contact

verification.description: The verification status of the contact

eligibilityId.description: The corresponding ID number for the eligibility name if applicable, if in doubt just use the same details as your Registrant ID.

eligibilityName.description: This field is usually optional and whether it is required is determined by your policy reason for the domain registration, if in doubt just use the same details as your Registrant Name.

eligibilityType.description: The type of entity that the registrant is.

registrantId.description: Australian Business Number or Registered Business Number.

registrantIdType.description: Concerns the Registrant ID which you have selected in the Registrant ID form field.

intededUse.description: The statement of intended use for the domain name.

intendedUse.description: The statement of intended use for the domain name.

others.description: Additional descriptions for OTHIDV and OTHORG.

above18.description: Is the person 18 years of age or older. For Person only.

entityType.description: The number of the matching entity.

adminType.description: Contact is the administrative contact with the permission to act as an independent agent / recruiter on behalf of the listed registrant.

contactTitle.description: Title of the domain contact in the organization.

hrMember.description: Choose whether the contact is is a member of the Human Resource Organization

adressLine1.description: The first line of the address.

adressLine2.description: The second line of the address.

adressLine3.description: The third line of the address.

qualifiedLawyerAccreditationId.description: The qualified lawyer accreditation ID is a character string issued by the accreditation body. Accreditation IDs uniquely identify the registrant within the context of the accreditation body. An accreditation ID is required.

qualifiedLawyerAccreditationBody.description: The qualified lawyer accreditation body is the entity that issued the accreditation ID to the registrant. Within the qualified lawyer extension, a character string is used to represent an accreditation body. The accreditation body is required.

qualifiedLawyerAccreditationYear.description: A qualified lawyer accreditation year is the year he/she was initially certified by the accreditation body. It is represented by a four-digit year including the century. Mandatory.

qualifiedLawyerJurisdictionCc.description: The qualified lawyer accreditation jurisdiction country is the country in which the accreditation body certifies the registrant. ISO two-letter country codes are used to represent the accreditation jurisdiction country. The accreditation jurisdiction country is required.

qualifiedLawyerJurisdictionSp.description: The qualified lawyer accreditation jurisdiction state/province is the specific region, within the accreditation jurisdiction country, in which the accreditation body certifies the registrant. A character string represents the region. The accreditation jurisdiction is required when the accrediting body limits the certification to this area.

taxpayerIdentificationNumber.description: Taxpayer Identification Number (code). Mandatory for organisations which belong to the Russian Federation.

territoryLinkedTaxpayerNumber.description: Territory-linked Taxpayer Number (kpp). Mandatory for organisations which belong to the Russian Federation.

enterpriseId.description: The enterprise ID, in the specific context of .swiss based on current rules, is the Swiss UID/IDE/IDI.

intededUse.description: The statement of intended use for the domain name.

nonResolverDomain.description: XXX community membership available or not.

payment.description: The payment typ of the customer.

expire.description: The expire date of the domain.

payable.description: The payable date of the domain.

nameServerEntries.description: NSentry is only be provided for .DE. If NSentry is used, nameServers is not allowed.

trustee.description: Enable trustee service for the domain.

privacy.description: Enable privacy service for the domain.

autoDnsSec.description: Enable auto dnssec for the domain.

confirmOrder.description: Some TLDs require a confirmation of the Terms and Conditions of Registration.

confirmOwnerConsent.description: Confirms the consent of the domainowner for the changes. Required for gTLDs and new gTLDs when changing the name, the email address or the organization of the domain owner.

includeWWW.description: Enable utomatic creation of the www subdomain.

priceClass.description: The priceclass for the registration of the domain.

priceClassRenew.description: The priceclass for the renew of the domain.

rddsOptIn.description: Enables the whois output to show redacted contacts.

type.description: The cancelation type. TRANSIT is only possible for certain TLDs.

registryWhen.description: The date of the execution. Only necessary when ExecutionType equals DATE.

expire.description: The expire date of the domain.

payable.description: The payable date of the domain.

nameServerEntries.description: NSentry is only be provided for .DE. If NSentry is used, nameServers is not allowed.

trustee.description: Enable trustee service for the domain.

privacy.description: Enable privacy service for the domain.

autoDnsSec.description: Enable auto dnssec for the domain.

confirmOrder.description: Some TLDs require a confirmation of the Terms and Conditions of Registration.

confirmOwnerConsent.description: Confirms the consent of the domainowner for the changes. Required for gTLDs and new gTLDs when changing the name, the email address or the organization of the domain owner.

includeWWW.description: Enable utomatic creation of the www subdomain.

priceClass.description: The priceclass for the registration of the domain.

priceClassRenew.description: The priceclass for the renew of the domain.

rddsOptIn.description: Enables the whois output to show redacted contacts.

execution.description: The next execution date of the job.

messages.description: The messages belonging to the response.

data.description: The data for the response. The type of the objects are depending on the request and are also specified in the responseObject value of the response.

stid.description: The server transaction id for the response.

ctid.description: The client transaction id for the response.

messages.description: The messages belonging to the response.

data.description: The data for the response. The type of the objects are depending on the request and are also specified in the responseObject value of the response.

objects.description: The object that belongs to the message.

job.description: The job data. Available if the message is a job message

notify.description: The notification data. Available if the message is a notification message

source.description: The domain to be redirected. Enter the domain with or without "www".

target.description: The URL of the target domain. Enter the domain without "http://"

domain.description: The domain, which the redirect belongs.

sourceIdn.description: The IDN version of the domain to be redirected. Enter the domain with or without "www".

targetIdn.description: The IDN version of the URL of the target domain. Enter the domain without "http://"

summary.description: The amound of objects found in list tasks.

code.description: The result code of the response

text.description: The text representation of the result code.

fname.description: The first name of the contact

lname.description: The last name of the contact

phone.description: The phone number of the contact

fax.description: The fax number of the contact

state.description: The local country state of the contact

updater.description: The updating using of the object

approverEmail.description: The approver email of the san.

orderId.description: The order id of the san.

customer.description: The customer belonging to the user.

main.description: IP address of the zone (A record)

nameServerGroup.description: The name of the name server group, if the zone is managed by

updater.description: The updating user of the object

logId.description: The id of the related log-entry.

domainsafe.description: true if the domain is represented in the domain safe

source.description: Nameserver, the zone is copied from via AXFR (for zone_import)

idn.description: The idn version of the origin.
